name: 911 Helicopter Rescue Night Ci
description:
911 Helicopter Rescue Night City is here to rescue injured patients from emergency situations on city traffic roads. Take control of helicopter ambulance and work in hospital paramedic team as first responder to rescue civilians.Flying in a helicopter has never been realistic as in this rescue helicopter flight simulator. Become a lifesaver with rescue helicopter simulator. 911 rescue department dispatches emergency calls to nearest hospital rescuers to save citizens.
• Play as Helicopter Pilot
• Real-time 911 Rescue Missions
• Fly Over the City and Reach Emergency Areas
• Manual Helicopter Handling and Flying
• Multiple Gameplay Tasks to Complete
